JobTitle: Master Data Management Product Owner, Audit & Assurance Products and Solutions

You will work closely with business leaders, and global stakeholders to define Master Data Architecture standards, governance and drive data capabilities adoption. Work you'll doLead the continued evolution and integration of our Master Data Management capabilities across the Audit & Assurance practice, establishing standards and providing influential leadership to drive cultural change, adoption, & governance.You'll collaborate with team members to establish full scale data solutions incorporating best of breed capabilities including; Data Quality, Data Anonymization, Data Discovery & Classification, Data Catalog, Data Lineage, Data Integration. Responsible for defining and delivering innovative Enterprise Data Services to realize the data capabilities that are core to our data strategy.Collaborate with and influences solution architects, engineers & delivery teams to incorporate Master Data architecture approaches into solutions.Develop talent and the next data functional leaders.QualificationsRequired:Bachelors in Computer Science (CS), Business MIS, or equivalent experience. Masters in Business Administration, CS or equivalent degree is preferred. Strong analytical and quantitative skills with the ability to use data and metrics to justify requirements, features and demonstrate business value.Ability to create compelling positioning, messaging, and strategy.
